thread.title: Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT
thread.title_full: Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT

title: Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT The Hough Huskies earned what many consider the biggest win in school history Friday night, upsetting Mallard Creek on the road 31-28 in overtime. Post to Facebook Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT The Hough Huskies earned what many consider the biggest win in school history Friday night, upsetting Mallard Creek on the road 31-28 in overtime.   WCNC.com: http://www.wcnc.com/story/sports/high-school/football/2015/10/10/hough-upsets-mallard-creek-in-ot-with-osborne-int/73725460/   Join the Conversation To   Hough upsets Mallard Creek in OT with Osborne INT Hough upset Mallard Creek 31-28 in overtime, avenging last season's loss to the Mavericks. WCNC WCNC 11:05 a.m. EDT October 10, 2015 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- The Hough Huskies earned what many consider the biggest win in school history Friday night, upsetting Mallard Creek on the road 31-28 in overtime. 
Future Tennessee Volunteer Marquill Osborne stepped up at the game's biggest moment, intercepting James Smith to seal the Huskies' victory. Last season, Hough had the Mavericks against the ropes 30-0 before a furious rally gave Mallard Creek another Mecka win. It was the first loss in conference for the Mavs since the 2008 season, the Mallard Creek finished 1-10. 
Miles Aldridge's Huskies have put themselves in the driver's seat in the Mecka, but a tough test in A.L. Brown awaits the Huskies next week.
